rows.label: tev900101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Development on the Hraesvelg just hit a
milestone, so I got a long overdue break.
Honestly, I don't have a whole lot to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0020
rows.name:
If it's fine by you, could I tag along while
you go about your BLADE duties? Call it
returning the favor for helping me earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0040
rows.name: Add Liesel to your team.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0050
rows.name:
Excellent. I'm all yours, then.
I look forward to flaunting my skills
in your service.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0060
rows.name:
I'll happily do all the Skell-piloting you
need. You'll be picking your jaw up off
the floor, and that's a promise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0070
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0080
rows.name: Decline Liesel's request for now.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0090
rows.name:
I see. Well, that's all right, I can take
a rain check. Let me know anytime you
want to take me up on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0100
rows.name:
Now then...
What should I do with myself...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0110
rows.name:
Following Alicia's business plan, our new
company will offer protection services,
dispatching combat personnel as needed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0120
rows.name:
Chief among them, me. What do you sayâ€”
wanna bring me along? I'll even waive the
fee in consideration of services rendered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0140
rows.name: Add Liesel to your team.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0150
rows.name:
You got it.
I'll keep you safe and sound. And hey...
leave a good review, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0170
rows.name: Decline Liesel's request for now.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0180
rows.name: Hm... Really? Well, that's a shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0190
rows.name:
Another time, then. You ever need me,
you know where to find me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0200
rows.name:
The provisional government's been
censoring news about the Lifehold Core,
but I can tell the situation's pretty urgent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0210
rows.name:
I'd be more than happy to help you out.
Whenever you need somebody, just say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0220
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0230
rows.name: Add Liesel to your team.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0240
rows.name: Gotcha. Lead the way, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900101_JNK0250
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900101_SEL0260
rows.name: Decline Liesel's request for now.

rows.label: tev900101_MSG0270
rows.name:
I understand, and I trust your judgment.
I just hope you know how much you can
chew, and bite accordingly.[ST:wait ]
